title: MySQL InnoDB Metrics
description: This dashboard provides performance metrics for innodb engine in mysql/maraidb.

targets.query: select last(value) from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Innodb_checkpoint_age' AND "type" = 'gauge' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
targets.target: select last(value) from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'Innodb_checkpoint_age' AND "type" = 'gauge' AND "instance" = 'status' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT last(value) FROM "mysql_value" WHERE "instance" = 'status' AND "type_instance" = 'Uptime' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

select last(value) from "mysql_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'innodb_buffer_pool_size' AND "type" = 'gauge' AND "instance" = 'variables' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
